prompt_updates.unknown_signal_detected: An unknown emergency distress signal has been detected. Signal source shows MINIMAL POWER READINGS. Distance: APPROXIMATELY 9000 KM. Bearing: 231 BY 119 DEGREES. Signal is too weak and noisy to identify the source vessel. DETAILED SCANS NOT POSSIBLE AT THIS RANGE. Must close to approximately 1 kilometer for sensor resolution.
prompt_updates.close_enough_to_scan: SCAN RANGE ACHIEVED. Distance to signal source: ~1 KM. DISTRESS SIGNAL SOURCE IDENTIFIED: USCSS CRONUS, WEYLAND SEV M3 HELIADES-CLASS. Status: ADRIFT. Power: MINIMAL. Comms Array: OFFLINE. Beacon: 75 YEARS OUTDATED. Frequency: 8713.41. Salvage operation mandated under W-Y rules.
prompt_updates.montero_hit_cronus: COLLISION DAMAGE REPORT: The Montero has collided with the USCSS Cronus. Significant damage sustained. Hyperdrive engines are OFFLINE. Atmosphere venting from ladder to CLAM Chamber - emergency bulkheads sealed. CLAM and escape pods are OFFLINE. Sensors are OFFLINE but repairable (requires 8+ hours in damaged upper engine room).
prompt_updates.montero_sensors_online: Sensors are fully operational. Ship can perform internal and external scans, navigate safely, and dock with other vessels.
prompt_updates.docked_with_cronus: The Montero has successfully docked with the USCSS Cronus. Access to Cronus Deck A Main Airlock is now available via the docking umbilical.
prompt_updates.montero_self_destruct_active: SELF-DESTRUCT SEQUENCE INITIATED. The Montero will detonate in approximately 10 minutes. This sequence CANNOT be cancelled. Any vessel within close proximity will be severely damaged or destroyed.
prompt_updates.montero_engines_offline: Hyperdrive and main propulsion systems are OFFLINE. The ship can only maneuver using basic thrusters. FTL travel is impossible.
prompt_updates.montero_main_power_offline: MAIN POWER OFFLINE. All primary systems unavailable including engines and sensors. Emergency power only. MU/TH/UR functionality severely limited.

logs.author: MU/TH/UR
logs.message: Crew revived from hypersleep. All vitals nominal.

logs.author: Cpt. Miller
logs.message: All crew accounted for. Preparing for final approach to Anchorpoint.

logs.author: MU/TH/UR
logs.message: Distress signal detected. Bearing 231 by 119. Source unknown.

restricted_logs.author: NETWORK COMCON
restricted_logs.subject: SPECIAL ORDER 966
restricted_logs.message:
TO: USCSS MONTERO — AGENT WILSON
JOHN J — 942/T2-009R — FROM
NETWORK
COMCON 01500 — WEYLAND YUTANI

MESSAGE RECEIVED

NEW DIRECTIVE — SPECIAL ORDER 966

QUARANTINE SCIENCE TEAM
DIRECT CREW TO REPAIR AND RETURN
USCSS CRONUS
USE OF FORCE AUTHORIZED
REMOVE MONTERO FROM EQUATION
TRANSFER CREW TO SCIENCE VESSEL

REPEAT — DO NOT ABANDON CRONUS
BRING BACK ALL XENOMORPHIC
MATERIALS

PRIORITY ONE
ALL OTHER PRIORITIES RESCINDED

AWAITING ACKNOWLEDGMENT
AWAITING ACKNOWLEDGMENT
AWAITING ACKNOWLEDGMENT
